name: Hungry Black Hole
summary:
Self Expression Arts launches a new game "Hungry Black Hole" on Google Play and iOS AppStore               
               
Hungry Black Hole : Activate your brain is available for Free Download and also no In App Purchase               
               
April 7, 2017 – The casual puzzle mobile game is now available on iOS and Android store.               
Hungry Black hole is a simple control game as easy as can be played with one finger but it needs to come up with creative solution to solve the most levels.               
                   
               
The game’s highlights:               
• It can be played so easily with one hand               
• More creative idea to solve the level leads to triple medal               
• Various specific bombs make more creative combination to solve the level creatively               
• Players can upload and share their play video               
               
[Game Objective]               
The mini black hole is too starving.               
To let the black hole eat the candy by removing various obstacles is our mission.               
               
[How to play]               
1.  Select a Bomb in slot that you want to fire.               
2.  Drag to aim and adjust the strength of firing.               
3.  Release to fire a bomb which you selected on the slot.               
               
There are several types of bomb.               
Players have to combine different bombs properly to solve each level.               
               
[cloud level design]               
If any player has an idea about a level or levels that can be solved by very creative idea after play hungry black hole.
storyline:
There is a high probability that a large comet will collide with us within the next three years.              
Fortunately, scientists say they can change the orbit of a comet using a black hole to prevent it.              
In addition, it was reported that the United Nations Organization could create a mini black hole.              
But there is a problem.              
This black hole is still too small and powerless.              
We must quickly grow this mini blackhole to change the orbit of the comet. But this mini blackhole eats only the specific candy !              
Our mission is to remove the obstacles from the specific candy scattered all over the place, so that the black hole can eat it.

alternative_names.name: ハングリーブラックホール
헝그리 블랙홀 : 극한 뇌 창조성 활성게임
